meanings.definition: The quality of being inexpensive or low in price.
meanings.sent1: The cheapness of the products attracted many budget-conscious shoppers.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the cheapness of this store; I can buy so much with my limited budget.
meanings.sent3: The cheapness of the items made me wonder if they were secretly made of cardboard.
meanings.sent4: The cheapness of the furniture was evident in its flimsy construction.
meanings.sent5: The cheapness of the clothes was evident in their thin fabric and loose threads.

meanings.definition: The state of being of low quality or lacking value.
meanings.sent1: The cheapness of the materials used in the toy made it break easily.
meanings.sent2: I was disappointed by the cheapness of the jewelry I bought; it tarnished quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cheapness of the painting made it look like a child's art project.
meanings.sent4: The cheapness of the ingredients was evident in the bland taste of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The cheapness of the construction led to the building's rapid deterioration.
